about.name: Yashas Majmudar
about.title: AI-Native Full Stack Developer
about.summary: AI-Native Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building intelligent, scalable applications. Specializes in integrating production-grade LLMs (LangChain, RAG, Gemini) into real-world systems, reducing data retrieval latency by 40%. Combines deep expertise in Python and Flutter with modern AI tooling to deliver end-to-end solutions from mobile frontends to AI-powered backends. Proven track record scaling applications to 10k+ users while maintaining 99.8% uptime.
highlights: Production-grade LLM integration with LangChain, RAG, and Gemini
Serverless AI systems with Vector Databases and automated CI/CD
Cross-platform software development with Flutter
Backend engineering with FastAPI and Node.js
Cloud architecture and DevOps with AWS, GCP, Docker, and Kubernetes

philosophy.frontend: I build applications that feel as good as they look. Using Flutter and Dart, I combine architectural discipline with a focus on micro-interactions and accessibility, ensuring that complex functionality never compromises the user experience.
philosophy.backend: My backend philosophy is simple: use the best tool for the job. I architect high-concurrency services using Node.js, while leveraging Python and FastAPI to power complex AI pipelines. I build systems that are not just fast, but intelligent.
philosophy.infrastructure: Great software needs a solid foundation. From vector search in ChromaDB to relational structures in PostgreSQL, I design data ecosystems that scale. I use Docker and GitHub Actions to ensure that deployment is boring, predictable, and fast.
philosophy.leadership: Engineering is an art form. My background in music and stage performance shapes how I build software with structure, rhythm, and the audience in mind. It fuels my ability to perform under pressure and communicate complex technical ideas with clarity and confidence.
